byline: Jeff Tyler, Bruce Johnson, Gigi Douban, David Brancaccio, Nancy Marshall-Genzer and Sabri Ben-Achour
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, January 13, 2014
teaser: We get the first rush of bank earnings today. Bank profits are still up, despite expensive lawsuits and decreased lending. A look at the top financial and economic risks of 2014. And Volkswagen says it plans to invest billions in North America. The VW brand, which continues to achieve low U.S. quality scores, says the bold move was a sign of a new commitment to the market.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, January 13, 2014
